abstract: The U.S. retail giant and five other companies have agreed to invest in 360buy.com, one of China’s fastest-growing e-commerce companies.
snippet: The U.S. retail giant and five other companies have agreed to invest in 360buy.com, one of China’s fastest-growing e-commerce companies.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  Wal-Mart and five other companies have agreed to invest $500 million in 360buy.com, a fast-growing online retailer in China, the Chinese company said.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Moves to Invest in China Online Retailer
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart in Deal With Chinese Retail Site

abstract: Wal-Mart Stores and five other companies have moved to invest $500 million in 360buy.com, the fast-growing online retailer in China.
snippet: Wal-Mart Stores and five other companies have moved to invest $500 million in 360buy.com, the fast-growing online retailer in China.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart Stores and five other companies have moved to invest $500 million in 360buy.com, the fast-growing Chinese online retailer, David Barboza of The New York Times reported on Monday.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Invest in Chinese Online Retailer
